thread.title: Listen to Weezer's Brand New Song, 'Thank God For Girls'
thread.title_full: Listen to Weezer's Brand New Song, 'Thank God For Girls' | Maxim

author: Kelly McClure
title: Listen to Weezer's Brand New Song, 'Thank God For Girls'
text:
Before we get to the details of Weezer's new song, let's join hands in a brief sing-a-long to the tune of their classic hit " Buddy Holly. " Ready? Okay: Oo-ee-oo this looks just like a new Weezer song / Oh-oh, and it's called "Thank God For Girls" / We all care what it sounds like anyway, we all care about that.
Tuesday night, during an iHeartRadio event, the band played a brand new track called "Thank God For Girls." This is the first we've heard from the band since last year's Everything Will Be Alright in the End .
Here's the live recording of the song via Substream :
The official single is set to be released on October 26.
Thank God for Girls - 10/26 #wcw

Oct 21, 2015 at 9:45am PDT
